content: पावक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [पू-ण्वुल्] Purifying. --कः {@--1@} Fire; पावकस्य महिमा स गण्यते कक्षवज्ज्वलति सागरेऽपि यः <ls>R. 11. 75</ls>, <ls n="R. 11."></ls> <ls n="R.">3. 9</ls>; <ls n="R.">16. 87.</ls> {@--2@} Agni or the god of fire. {@--3@} The fire of lightning. {@--4@} The Citraka tree. {@--5@} The number ‘three’. {@--6@} A person purified by religious abstraction, saint, sage. {@--7@} Good conduct or behaviour. {@--8@} <ab>N.</ab> of Varuṇa. --की {@--1@} The wife of Agni. {@--2@} <ab>Ved.</ab> <ab>N.</ab> of Sarasvatī.
